Description: Pottery ostracon with part of one incised line - Coptic (?), with one incised horizontal border-line below, from the shoulder of a vessel.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394076) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394076)
